Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, bone marrow, or other tissue samples
Purpose: To amplify and identify the CD15 STR marker for identity verification, forensic analysis, and genetic research.
Container: EDTA, heparin, or other DNA-preserving collection tubes
Equipment: PCR thermal cycler, electrophoresis apparatus, UV transilluminator/gel documentation system, DNA extraction kit, vortex mixer, microcentrifuge, pipettes, sterile microcentrifuge tubes
